headline: Why Riot Platforms (RIOT) Is Up 5.3% After Landing AMD as Anchor Tenant in Tax‑Backed Texas Expansion
summary: Riot Platforms recently secured a 10-year property tax abatement from Milam County to support its Texas data center expansion, and named Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) as the first tenant at the new facility, which is intended to serve both Bitcoin mining and broader data center operations. This combination of local tax support and an anchor lease with AMD marks a meaningful shift in Riot’s power-intensive infrastructure toward institutional-scale data center services alongside its core mining...

headline: The Surge in Micron Technology Stock Looks Poised to Continue
summary: Driven by the global memory chip shortage, Micron Technology has enjoyed exceptional pricing power, an advantage that strongly supports the continued momentum in its stock.

raw.headline: The Surge in Micron Technology Stock Looks Poised to Continue
